dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: Monthly P M2.5 data at more than 200,000 space-time locations from January 1999 to December 2022 for fast imputation of missing values and forecasts with uncertainties.
dcterms:title: P M2.5 Data

dcterms:creator: S. Abdulah
F. Alamri
P. Nag

H. Ltaief

M. G. Genton
dcterms:description: Data simulated using ExaGeoStat from a zero-mean Gaussian process with a non-separable stationary space-time covariance function for spatio-temporal prediction.
dcterms:title: KAUST Competition Data

dcterms:creator: S. Abdulah
F. Alamri
P. Nag
Y. Sun
H. Ltaief
D. Keyes
M. G. Genton
dcterms:description: Simulated nonstationary space-time data over 100 spatial and 500 temporal locations using a zero-mean stationary Gaussian process with added mean nonstationarity.
dcterms:title: Nonstationary Space-Time Simulation Data
